title: Trump news live: Latest updates as ex-aide Corey Lewandowski appears to admit lying
text:
Donald Trump's ex-campaign manager Corey Lewandowski could be held in contempt of Congress over his stonewalling before the House Judiciary Committee on Tuesday, a tense hearing in which he refused to answer questions, appeared to admit lying to the media, promoted his website during a bathroom break and was told his behaviour was “completely unacceptable”.

The president himself is in California on Wednesday, where he will attend further fundraisers and visit his US-Mexico border wall having already angered the blue state by saying its homeless population spoils the “prestige” of Los Angeles and San Francisco and plotting to revoke its powers to set its own auto emissions standards.

On Air Force One, Mr Trump made a vague pledge to resolve his trade war with China in time for the 2020 election, mocked Democratic rival Elizabeth Warren over the crowd she drew to a New York City rally on Monday and failed to mourn the passing of journalist Cokie Roberts, saying: “She never treated me nicely”.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.
